timeline.message: Fix for #426: null sender result throws NPE in MessageSendingPipe (#431)
Fix for #425: Nested stacktrace ends at ForEachChildElementPipe (#429)
Make sure the proper SpringBus is passed through to the IbisContext #445 (#446)
Fix security role bindings not being displayed
Make sure menu item and breadcrum are consistent #448
Add ladda and log full stacktrace #450
Remove formatted strings in IAF API #443
added test classes for some pipes

added ReplacerPipe

added with full coverage, however I still need to add one case which does replace non xml characters and unicode supplementary characters

created uploadFilePipe

created a template of createFilePipe

added Text2XMLPipeTest

%90 coverage, one fix or improvement can be to find a way to throw an io exception. i couldnt think of a case where the program throws an io exception

added UploadFilePipe

With full coverage. I think the class name should be changed to UploadZipFilePipe though, as it only supports zip files

ReplaceFilePipe back to original version

I had to change the method access modifier to public to test out one method to understand how it works, now it is back to its normal version

Delete IsUserInRolePipeTest

deleted as I couldn't figure out a way yet to modify the roles, will look  further in this class after I finish the tests of other classes

add 2 complete test classes

added 2 complete classes and several incomplete classes that I will try to finish up this afternoon

Add test classes for pipes

Nearly all pipe classes are tested now with a few important exceptions like MessageSendingPipe.

Merge pull request #1 from ibissource/master

syncing the main and forked repository

Merge pull request #2 from sinasen2000/master

merge master into pipetest branch to sync the pipe test with the main master

refactor test files for syncing

Refactored the test files for pipes with to have them in sync with the master. 
Removed some test classes whose classes are deprecated.

refactor code for code quality

refactored the code for improving the code quality.
deleted classes which are vaguely tested, will have to retest those.
fix test that blocks the build

Merge pull request #9 from ibissource/master

sync forked master
Initialize the test class (from last week)
Added test cases and did test refactoring
Comment out a method to fix the build
Fix build, refactor moveFile method for comprehension
Change tempDir method such that the temp files get cleaned up

timeline.bodyText: Since this is a field that doesn't change, I recommend you turning it in to a public static final String and with final fields it's a java standard to use all caps as field name, so for example public static final String FILE_SEPARATOR = File.separator Not sure if it will be any shorter then File.separator which I believe was the idea here but just my 2c.
timeline.author: nielsm5

timeline.bodyText:
Please use an URL and turn that into a file here. Renaming the path or whatever would otherwise needlessly break the test.
this.getClass().getResource("/Pipes/movingFile.txt"); will return an URL (to which you could apply a null check (assertNotNull(xxxx)) which you can then feed to the new File constructor :)
timeline.author: nielsm5

replies.bodyText: I just realized you do this more often, maybe you could create a method that does all this and returns a File?
replies.author: nielsm5

replies.bodyText: yes, I will create a method for this and replace all.
replies.author: sinasen2000

timeline.bodyText: Try to add some funky characters that require to be encoded, such as /. :, ? to spice things up a bit.
timeline.author: nielsm5
